Method Detail

createHandRecorder

public static HandRecorder createHandRecorder(Hand h)
Creates a HandRecorder which attaches itself to the given Hand.

Parameters:
h - The hand which this HandRecorder listens for updates
Returns:
A HandRecorder which listens to updates from the given Hand
See Also:
HandChangeListener, Hand

start

public void start()
Begins recording the joint movements of the Hand

stop

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> stop()
Stops recording the Hand and returns the recording. If stop is invoked before start is invoked, then it will return the previous recording

Returns:
A list of Double values which iterate through each Joint in the order specified by JointName, beginning with the first joint

The method overridden in the HandChangeListener interface.

Specified by:
handChanged in interface HandChangeListener
Parameters:
he - the HandEvent which contains information about the change of state of the Hand class.
